Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa to control your RYSE SmartShade directly through voice command. You have the ability to open, close, raise, lower and set to any specific position of your choosing. In addition to this, you have the ability to stop your window shade while it is moving and check what the current position of the shade is.

HARDWARE REQUIREMENTS:
- RYSE SmartBridge with valid Ethernet or WiFi connection
- RYSE SmartShade installed and calibrated to each shade OR RYSE SmartCurtain installed and calibrated on each curtain

ACCOUNT REQUIREMENTS:
- RYSE account created during configuration of the SmartBridge
- Email associated with RYSE account must be registered to SmartBridge

Make life easier by automating your existing window coverings. Smart thermostats, smart lights, smart speakers - isn't it time you have smart shades? RYSE SmartShade and SmartCurtain will complete your Alexa-enabled smart home.
Here are some ways that you can control RYSE SmartShade with Alexa:
"Alexa, open bedroom window"
"Alexa, close bedroom window"
"Alexa, set bedroom window to 35 percent"
"Alexa, raise living room window"
"Alexa, lower living room window"
"Alexa, raise living room window by 15 percent"
"Alexa, lower living room window by 25 percent"
"Alexa, what is the bedroom shade set to?"
